name: The Planet Saturn Represented as a Man on a Donkey
description: The Planet Saturn Represented as a Man on a Donkey; Unknown; Ulm, Germany; shortly after 1464; Watercolor and ink on paper bound between original wood boards covered with original pigskin; Leaf: 30.6 x 22.1 cm (12 1/16 x 8 11/16 in.); Ms. Ludwig XII 8, fol. 51; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Planet Saturn Represented as a Man on a Donkey
medium: Watercolor and ink on paper bound between original wood boards covered with original pigskin
